name: painterly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to, like, or typical of a painting or a painter: The film is characterized by its painterly visual style. Her work has not lost its painterly qualities as she has grown older. He became famous for his precise, almost painterly compositions.
More examplesFewer examplesShe describes her experience in the prison in almost painterly detail. The artist uses computers to create his wild and painterly images.As an art lover she has a painterly eye for detail.
